full_summary:
# Notice of Public Tender

## Overview
**Title:** 
Hitachi Maintenance & Support or equivalent for GRC

The Government of Canada is issuing a call for tenders for the provision of Hitachi Maintenance & Support or an equivalent solution to support shared services for the Government of Canada.

## Solicitation Details

### Tender Information
**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00024548:T
**Publication Date:** November 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** December 12, 2023 @ 2:00 PM EST
**Tender Status:** Expired (no longer accepting bids)

### Procurement Category
**GSOIN:** N7030
**Description:** ADP Software

### Procurement Method
**Competitive - Open Bidding:** The procurement will be carried out using a competitive open-bidding process.

### Trade Agreements
**Accords Commerciaux:**
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity
**Province d'Opportunités:**
- Ontario (except NCR)
- Canada

### Contracting Entity Details
**Nom de l'entité Contractante:** Shared Services Canada
**Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1G 4A8

### Contact Information
**Contact Nom:** Kyle,Hnatyshin
**Contact Téléphone:** 613-614-1493
**Contact Fax:** 613-614-1493
**Contact Email:** None
**Contact Address:** SSC Kent Street, 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, National Capital Region, Ontario, K1G 4A8

### Tender Documents
The tender documents can be accessed at the following link:
